news.image_caption: ThreeFold Tech recognized by Deloitte Belgium
news.content:
Congratulations to ThreeFold Tech üëè which was recognized as one of 10 finalists by Deloitte Belgium in its Rising Star competition. ThreeFold Tech is responsible for the technology behind the ThreeFold Grid.

Deloitte will announce the winner on 26 November 2020. ü§û You can read more about the news here.
news.excerpt: Congratulations to ThreeFold Tech, which was recognized as one of 10 finalists by Deloitte Belgium in its Rising Star competition! More within.

previous.title: TomoChain & ThreeFold are joining forces to decentralize Cloud Computing
previous.excerpt: TomoChain will invite their developer community and anyone interested in contributing to the TomoChain Blockchain, to connect and use the Threefold Grid.

next.title: ThreeFold's October 2020 community update is here
next.excerpt: It‚Äôs the end of October and a lot has gone on this month ‚Äì an upgrade to testnet, progress on ThreeFold Now, some notable new team members, and more! Find the link to the full update within!
